Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a go-ahead three-run home run in the ninth inning to turn a 2-0 deficit into a 3-2 lead.
Milwaukee Brewers took a 2-0 lead with back-to-back home runs in the seventh inning.
Post-Match Reflections: The victory marked the Mets' first playoff series win since 2015.
Every team to eliminate the Brewers from the playoffs has gone on to reach the World Series.
